full_summary:
### Compact Tracked Loader: Request for Proposal

**Title:** Compact Tracked Loader
**Reference Number:** cb-5600-4362298
**Amendment Number:** 1
**Solicitation Number:** E60HS-19BCKH/002-HS

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Trade Agreements:**
This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Procurement Category:** Goods (GD)

**Tender Status:** Expired

**Deliverables:**
The Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) is seeking proposals for the supply of one (1) compact tracked loader. The deliverable must include delivery, on-site installation, and training if required.

**Mandatory Technical Criteria:**
All bidders must meet the mandatory technical criteria outlined in the bid solicitation.

**Evaluation Criteria:**
The responsive bidder who meets the mandatory technical criteria with the lowest aggregate price will be recommended for contract award.

**Timeline:**
The tender closing date is **2023-06-08T14:00:00**. The expected contract start date is **2023-06-07**, and the expected contract end date is **2023-08-01**.

**Contact Information:**
For more information, please contact:
* Sarah Halpenny
* Phone: (613) 864-9314
* Email: [sarah.halpenny@inspection.gc.ca](mailto:sarah.halpenny@inspection.gc.ca)

**Important Notes:**
This request is reserved for holders of Supply Arrangement # E60HS-19BCKH only. The bid solicitation process is open only to suppliers holding a Supply Arrangement (SA) under the Request (RFSA) E60HS-19BCKH/A. If you wish to become a pre-qualified supplier under this RFSA, refer to [https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tender-notice/PW-HS-651-78185](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tender-notice/PW-HS-651-78185).

The requested delivery date for the above-mentioned goods is **August 1, 2023**.
